BushTripInjector.ChangeLog:
0.7.6.1027 FEATURE: Selecting the Textcolors for Activity Widget FEATURE: Select the Language to use for WPNames and/or TTS, if you don*t want to use translated entries UPDATE: Another try to avoid spawning in other aircrafts when parking spots are used UPDATE: new window for update info UPDATE: Workaround for bing maps issue with antimeridian crossings
--- 0.7.5.1008 FEATURE: Activated Failures in Events&Triggers Editor. Not all Failures will work with any plane. Checkout by yourself and blame Asobo/MS if not working, not me! Feel free to report working and non-working combinations, I will add them to the FAQ. FEATURE: Unintentional released the timer triggers in Event&Triggers with v0.7.3.981. Complete Change-log here! FEATURE: Workaround for sim bug: Added the option to disable translation for Waypoint Names for displaying them in POI markers FEATURE: Workaround for bad TTS: Added the option to disable translation for TTS. UPDATE: Create 2D Landing Images from WorldMap manually UPDATE: Moved 'Add TTS' and 'Create Waypoint Image' into ContextMenu of WorldMap UPDATE: Updated Property Definitions for SPB-Compiler to Sim Version 1.15.7 BUGFIX: Fixed a bug in creation of TTS for WayPoints after an airport. This could lead to not playing the TTS. You need to remove those TTS and re-create them, sorry! BUGFIX: Fixed a bug drawing the TTS rectangle on WorldMap.
